item.title: Walmart Inc 10-K
item.description: Walmart Inc, which is in the Retail-Variety Stores [5331] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 18, 2022 had 33484 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 341 instances 2022 - 338 instances 2021 - 291 instances company - 285 instances u - 244 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
